aboutme.title: ABOUT ME
aboutme.description: I am a Mechatronics Engineer and MSc Robotics graduate with expertise in mechanical design, software development, and electronics.
aboutme.objetive: Proven track record in delivering scalable software solutions and integrating multidisciplinary systems. Recognized for adaptability, quick learning, and problem-solving in fast-paced environments.
